title: The (Watch) Faces of Qatar
description: As the World Cup nears, six residents describe their timepieces.
dc:creator: David Belcher

media:content.media:credit: Adriane de Souza for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Mutaz Essa Barshim had a watch designed for him by Richard Mille after winning a silver medal in the high jump at the 2016 Rio Olympics.
